title: Proficiency
content: Lv1 Keen Senses Feature You have proficiency in the Perception skill. Elf Longbow Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Longbows. Elf Shortbow Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Shortbows. Elf Mask of the Wild Trait You were raised to blend into your natural surroundings. You gain proficiency in Stealth. Wood Elf Lvl 1 Wood Half-Elf Lvl 1 Greatsword Proficiency Feature Add
